name: Vallen Voss
bio: The half-elf enigmatic leader of the True Order, burdened with restoring the shattered legacy of Saâ€™dakar.

name: Ophelia
bio: A fierce half-tiefling mage and former Sister of the Rose.

name: Ser Kaelen the Ashen
bio: Once a knight of the True Order turned zealot, now exiled after razing Ebonreach in pursuit of false prophecy.

name: Venya Ashveil
bio: A powerful spellblade of the Spire who seeks balance between order and knowledge. Known for tactical brilliance and cold resolve.
